titles.title: To revive and extend through December 31, 1996, a temporary reduction of duty on certain disposable surgical gowns and drapes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2000)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the suspension of duty on certain disposable surgical gowns and drapes.
